entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 3:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
